title: ABOUT US
objective: Promote research processes in the area of exact sciences and engineering, based on the diagnoses resulting from social interaction processes, for the development of knowledge and technologies that propose solutions to real problems and internationalize our research capabilities.
vision-body: The Center for Research in Exact Sciences and Engineering is a social reference in the processes of diagnosis and search for technological solutions through the generation of knowledge and techniques developed under the principles of the faith - reason dialogue.
